column.name: type
column.text: 报表页面元素类型: 1=按钮 2=下拉框（单选）3=下拉框（多选）4=文本框 5=TextArae 6=File 7=日历 8=数字框

column.name: btn_before_script
column.text: 按钮点击前事件触发的js函数

column.name: btn_after_script
column.text: 按钮点击后事件触发js函数

statements.statement:
select * from rpt_resource where 1=1 <#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and (
name like '%${key}%' or
code like '%${key}%' or
type like '%${key}%' or
btn_before_script like '%${key}%' or
btn_after_script like '%${key}%' or
app_code like '%${key}%' or
remark like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#-- -------------------关键字查询结束 --------------- -->
<#-- -------------------综合查询开始 --------------- -->
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.definitionId??> and definition_id = ${query.definitionId} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.type)}' </#if>
<#if query.btnBeforeScript??> and btn_before_script = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.btnBeforeScript)}' </#if>
<#if query.btnAfterScript??> and btn_after_script = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.btnAfterScript)}' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- -------------------综合查询结束 --------------- --> </#if>
